short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Overwatch Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Overwatch background. Overwatch wallpaper theme for fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Enjoy a fresh Overwatch wallpaper every time you open a new tab.  
2. Randomize Overwatch backgrounds or mark your favorites via the wallpaper selection panel.  
3. Convenient Google-powered search bar.  
4. Quick links to your emails and social media accounts.  
5. Automatically display the current date and time.  
6. Create and manage tasks using the "New Note" feature.  
7. Access your most visited websites with ease.  
8. Navigate to your bookmarks effortlessly.  
9. Add websites to the Shortcut panel for instant access.  
10. Seamless access to Google apps.  
11. Explore and apply additional themes quickly.  
12. Share directly to social media in just a click.  
13. Download your favorite wallpapers instantly.  
14. Dive into games with quick access.  
15. Enable fun animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, or fireworks in your Overwatch new tab experience.
